body_html:
No, it can't work with GLIBC_2_12.

$ python reduce_sum_tengli.py --rank 0
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "reduce_sum_tengli.py", line 1, in <module>
    import torch
  File "/home/zhangruiqing01/tools/anaconda3_torch_distributed/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 77, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by /home/zhangruiqing01/tools/py-torch-install/nccl_install/nccl_2.0.5-3+cuda8.0_amd64/lib/libnccl.so.2)

body:
No, it can't work with GLIBC_2_12. 
```
$ python reduce_sum_tengli.py --rank 0
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "reduce_sum_tengli.py", line 1, in <module>
    import torch
  File "/home/zhangruiqing01/tools/anaconda3_torch_distributed/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 77, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by /home/zhangruiqing01/tools/py-torch-install/nccl_install/nccl_2.0.5-3+cuda8.0_amd64/lib/libnccl.so.2)
```
